titleStmt.title: A true copy of the petition of the Lords spiritual and temporal, for the calling of a free Parliament. Together with his Majesties gracious answer to their Lordships.
titleStmt.author: England. Parliament. House of Lords.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw. Jones in the Savoy,

notesStmt.note: Dated: Presented by the Archbishop of Canterbury, the Bishops of Exon, Ely, and Rochester, the 17th of November, 1688.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
